The bot sees his shot hit Dogged, and runs forward, jumping over 
Repungus's barrier and firing his gun twice more at Dogged.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Oh, I thought they were in an Alleyway above ground.
> 
> Doggeds speed was concentrated on the falling debris around 
him. "This bots
> crazy!" he thought knowing such a reckless attack could easily 
bring the
> entire tunnel down on them all. He noticed the second shot but 
didn't have
> time to move as it collided with him sending him rolling back from 
the
> impact. He reached up to feal his shoulder quickly learning that a 
gaping
> hole was now where his plating had been. He tried to move his arm, 
pain
> shooting through every servo in his body. His hand opened dropping 
his disk
> launcher to the ground. He opened a link to the others, "The preys 
biting
> back." He shouts trying to hold back his pain. "Do we really need 
the
> supplies this badly?" The Cybrats had normally taken whatever they 
needed
> but now what Dogged needed was a medic.
> 
> Dogged fealt a mysterious wave of virtigo come over him. He thought 
that the
> injuries were causing his mental state. He glanced in the direction 
of
> Repugnus and quickly realized that it was the Monsterbot who was 
causing his
> problems. He tried to recover his launcher when pain shit through 
his
> injured arm. The smallest of the Cybrats was nothing more than a 
useless
> target. In his condition ther was no way he'd be of any use to his 
team.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <Yanshosh@a...>
> To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 4:54 PM
> Subject: Re: The bum and the hole....
> 
> 
> > Just a reminder: this is all taking place in an underground 
tunnel.
> >
> > ::::
> >
> > The bot ducks quickly, a laser passing overhead. He straightens 
and slams
> his fist into the piece of metal heading for him, knocking it aside.
> Reaching behind him, he takes out a very large, mean-looking rifle, 
aiming
> it at Dogged. He pulls the trigger once, nearly stumbling back from 
the
> recoil. The shot misses, sailing past Dogged and smashing into the 
roof of
> the tunnel. A large explosion caves that section in, and the bot 
fires
> again, this time right on target, the explosive round heading for 
Dogged
> very quickly.
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > > Dogged  . transforms to four treaded
> > > terrain vehicle about the size of a snowmobile.
> > > Speeding through the flames, the heat warping the paint and 
singing the
> > > metal beneath. he remained focused on the bum. The two weakest 
bots were
> the
> > > origional targets so he remained fixxed on scrapping them first.
> > >
> > > Arty noticed that Slags attention was turned away from him. he 
raised
> his
> > > right arm and fired a sidewinder from the winglike attachment 
mounted at
> > > it's side. his left hand found his mini launcher. he drew it 
from his
> > > holster and fired an impact grenade toward Crossroads. His 
equilibreum
> > > caused dizzyness and he stumbled backwards his weight carrying 
him
> towards
> > > Pacifix.
> > >
> > > Switchblades optics began to blurr as Repugnus's waves took 
thier
> effect. He
> > > tried to adjust his optics to compensate but it was no use. he 
flew
> backward
> > > slowly until he could feal the building behind him. he dug his 
feet into
> the
> > > side hopeing that the effect would wear off shortly.
> > >
> > >
> > >

> > > >
> > > > Repugnus continues running at Switchblade while emitting 
color waves
> to
> > > > disrupt the bots optic sensors.
> > > >
> > > > ::Slag::
> > > > Slag spits another wave of fire towards Dogged.
> > > >
> > > > ::JetV::
> > > > JetV arrives at the battle scene some bit away. He scans the 
area.
> > > > "Artemis, you have any plans for this battle?"
> > > >
> > > > cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > > >
> > > > > Switchblade smirked as his missles scored direct 
hits. "YESSSSS" he
> > > shouted
> > > > > assuming victory was at hand. His cry of joy was prematurely
> inturupted
> > > as
> > > > > two laser beams pierced the smoke below. "Cybrats beware, 
they're
> more
> > > > > durable than we figured." The buglike bot swerved aside 
dodging the
> > > beams
> > > > > scanning them as they struck the building behind him. a 
laser line
> > > connected
> > > > > two blades on his arm, he launched it down onto the street 
below
> hoping
> > > to
> > > > > measure Grimlocks strength by pinning him to the ground 
before
> > > disassembling
> > > > > him.
> > > > > ------------------------------
> > > > >
> > > > >
> > > > > The bot swears, spinning around and jumping back. His 
scanners
> locate
> > > the
> > > > > bot that had attacked him, and he fires a missile back.
> > > > >
> > > > > ------------------------------------
> > > > > Doggeds line had hit it's target but for some reason didn't 
hold. He
> > > lept
> > > > > skyward drawing his disk launcher. He fired a stasis disk 
at the bum
> > > > > planning on the disks energy draining qualities to down his
> opponent. A
> > > > > missle steeked by him striking a building behind him. 
debris began
> to
> > > fall
> > > > > forcing Doggeds attention to be diverted. he lept from side 
to side
> > > using
> > > > > his speed to avoid the falling metal. he quickly grabbed a 
jagged
> piece
> > > of
> > > > > metal andhurled it with all the velocity he could muster at 
the bum.
